monday: Review foundational grammar rules and punctuation
tuesday: Read and analyze SAT reading passages
wednesday: Practice math problem-solving and data analysis
thursday: Apply grammar concepts in writing exercises
friday: Targeted math practice on weak areas (e.g. difficult algebra topics)
saturday: Full-length practice reading and writing sections
sunday: Rest or light review of error logs and vocabulary

monday: Practice advanced math problems involving functions and trigonometry
wednesday: Improve writing section strategy and essay planning (if essay is taken)
friday: Writing practice focusing on argument and evidence questions
sunday: Analyze practice test results, identify weak points

monday: Targeted math problem sets especially on recent mistakes
wednesday: Sentence correction drills and grammar review
thursday: Practice complex math concepts and problem-solving
sunday: Review test answers thoroughly, focus on errors

monday: Review key math formulas and strategies
wednesday: Practice pacing and time management techniques
thursday: Quick recap of grammar rules and math concepts

practice_test_schedule: End of Week 2: Full-length practice test
End of Week 3: Full-length practice test
recommended_resources: The College Board SAT Official Study Guide
